thread.title: Season 7 of Game of Thrones Will Give Us Dragons the Size of 747s
thread.title_full: Season 7 of Game of Thrones Will Give Us Dragons the Size of 747s

title: Season 7 of Game of Thrones Will Give Us Dragons the Size of 747s
text:
Season 7 of Game of Thrones Will Give Us Dragons the Size of 747s 
*wipes away tear* They grow up so fast. HBO By Sammy Nickalls Mar 16, 2017 We've seen Daenerys's dragons as babies, and we've seen them as rebellious teens. But for season 7, they'll be bigger than ever—specifically, the size of 747s. In a new interview with Entertainment Weekly , director Matt Shakman revealed that the dragons that the three creatures will be more terrifying than ever. "The dragons this year are the size of 747s," Shakman said. "Drogon is the biggest of the bunch—his flame is 30-feet in diameter!" Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Obviously, the Game of Thrones creators probably didn't measure out the dragons to be the precise size of a Boeing airliner, but just so you know, they're about 230 feet long with a 210 feet wingspan...so we're talking about some goddamn huge dragons here. All my bets are on Daenerys to win the throne. Related Story
